entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm] Update Wasm.Build.Tests to be able to run projects created in WasmTemplateTests #64237
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Use sourceName in templates #64235
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Add template options #64233
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Templates initial implementation #64232
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][windows] v8 doesn't seem to exit sometimes causing helix test run to time out #64227
  • [Blazor WebAssembly] Support for Cancelling HTTP Requests by Diposing Response Stream #64225
  • ReloadOnChange of AddJsonFile is invalid in kubernetes - not fixed #64222
  • PlatformNotSupportedException FileInfo_ReadRights_WithSecurity FileInfo_WriteRights_WithSecurity #64221
  • Introduce `CallConvSwift` to represent the Swift ABI calling convention #64215
  • Assertion failed 'vnStore->VNExcIsSubset(nodeExcSet.GetLiberal(), operandsExcSet.GetLiberal())' during 'Do value numbering' #64208
  • Validator.TryValidateObject on JObject throws System.ArgumentException #64207
  • [wasm][debugger] `DebuggerTests.AssignmentTests.InspectVariableBeforeAndAfterAssignment` failing #64188
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: CollectionsMarshal.GetKeys/ValuesAsReadOnlySpan #64187
  • Revisit default Quality used by BrotliStream for CompressionLevel.Optimal #64185
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: add high precision maths functions like log1p #64184
  • [API Proposal]: Support streaming deserialization of JSON objects #64182
  • [mono] Failing arm64 LLVM FullAOT tests #64179
  • Test failure Regressions/coreclr/GitHub_16833/Test16833/Test16833.sh #64178
  • Test failure Interop\\DisabledRuntimeMarshalling\\DisabledRuntimeMarshalling_NativeAssemblyDisabled\\DisabledRuntimeMarshalling_NativeAssemblyDisabled.cmd #64172

Closed

  • [Android][TimeZone] Backward TimeZone IDs found in Android tzdata #63693
    6.0.MAUI
  • Native frames missing crashreport.json #63309
    6.0.x
  • createdump fails with libunwind assert: Assertion `ip >= di->start_ip && ip < di->end_ip' failed. #64168
  • NET6 - Stopwatch.ElapsedMilliseconds returns wrong result when using monoVM on linux-arm #61599
  • NET6 - Wrong DateTime.ToString() formating when using monoVM and linux-arm #61598
    6.0.x
  • Arm6 Raspberry PI Zero - PI 1 #7764
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Generic math Assign operators #60536
  • [API Proposal]: Add String.Join(char, IEnumerable<string>) #60342
  • system.runtime.intrinsics.tests failing #64189
  • Enum.GetName returns wrong name of enum value. #60346
  • System.Drawing.Primitives (inbox) depends on Microsoft.Win32.SystemEvents (OOB) #64196
  • Assertion failed 'compIsaSupportedDebugOnly(InstructionSet_AVX2)' in Libraries Test Run checked coreclr OSX x64 Debug #64175
  • [Bug] MAUI templates crashing on iOS (Foundation.NSMutableData:AppendBytes) #61153
    6.0.x
  • Add IEquatable<T> to public Equals-overriding value types to enable CA1066/1067 #63687
    7.0.0
  • [Bug] Publishing maui rc2 app to App Store not working -- The app references non-public symbols in MyContactNetwork.MobileMaui: _proc_pidinfo #61265
    6.0.MAUI
  • Cookie doesn't get replaced in CookieContainer #60628
    7.0.0
  • Buffer allocated on LOH by XmlTextReader when using Async mode #61459
    Future
  • Could not load file or assembly System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData in .NET 6 #64101
  • .NET 6 Crash in UnlockedLoaderHeap::GetMoreCommittedPages (loaderheap.cpp) #64152
  • CookieContainer does not replace cookies with the same name #64203
  • [API Proposal]: Support ref struct as generic parameter of a generic ref struct type #64197
  • system.runtime.intrinsics.tests work item #64194
  • FileSystemAclExtensions.Create broken in multiple ways #57768
    7.0.0
  • RyuJIT: Recognize BLSR in "x & (x-1)" #63286
    Future
  • Port MD4 implementation from mono/mono #62265
    7.0.0
  • `System.IO.Tests.DirectoryLongerThanMaxLongPathWithExtendedSyntax_ThrowsException` test failing #64019
  • HashData stream one-shots can special case some stream types #64173
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Clang compilations for ARM64 can not initialize extern "C" variables. #64239
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Correct JsonNode.Root doc #64238
    documentation, area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Allow symbols 3 external symbols into the gcc/gcov library. #64236
    community-contribution
  • Expand System.Runtime.InteropServices.NFloat to support the APIs required by Xamarin #64234
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add gen folder moving gen projects from src folder #64231
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Fix unique VNs for `ADDR`s #64230
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Inject RegexGeneratorAttribute from the generator #64229
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Check for CMAKE_C_COMPILER_ID not CXX #64226
  • [release/7.0-preview1] Ensure that we aren't accidentally generating instructions for unsupported ISAs #64224
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Don't show the wasm functions on callstack when debugging managed code #64223
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Update main branding to preview2 #64219
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use hash size constants where applicable #64218
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Ensure that canceled Task.Delays invoke continuations asynchronously from Cancel #64217
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, tenet-reliability, 7.0.0
  • Avoid an assert in ves_icall_RuntimeFieldInfo_SetValueInternal #64214
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Skip tests using AsyncIO in FileSystemAclExtensionsTests where it's not supported #64212
    area-System.IO
  • Equalize promoted #64206
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Implemented hierarchy of attributes. #64201
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Console.Unix: fix missing terminal configuration on SIGINT/SIGQUIT/SGCONT. #64200
    area-System.Console, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Disable Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators.Roslyn3.11.Tests #64195
    arch-wasm
  • [release/6.0] Update zip extraction to never throw any exceptions when the LastWriteTime update fails #64192
    Servicing-consider, area-System.IO.Compression
  • Make XmlSerializer.Generator targets incremental #64191
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Delete unused ApiCompat baseline files #64190
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Change exception throw when ICustomMarshaller applied to field #64183
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix PAL_wprintf for wide characters #64181
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Improve Regex handling of anchors #64177
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Clone ADDR(LCL) for DUP #64171
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [release/6.0-maui] Android remove backward timezones #64228
  • Android remove backward timezones #64028
  • Drop support for .NET 5 SDK #64186
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • update generation_allocation_size correctly for SIP regions #64176
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Update tests to expect RemoteExecutor to check exit code #64133
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Put back FindCaseSensitivePrefix regex alternation support #64204
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Fix remote unwind #64220
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Tune floating-point CSEs live across a call better #63903
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Port Mono to Raspberry Pi, ship as new linux-armv6 RID #62594
    area-Infrastructure-mono, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Ensure that we aren't accidentally generating instructions for unsupported ISAs #64140
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [CodeSpace] Install v8 and Prebuild wasm #64100
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Android][libs] Enable Internal.Console.Write in System.Private.CoreLib #63949
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Don't reference .NETFramework shims in libraries product or test composition #64193
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Bump Intellisensense package version to latest from `dotnet7-transport` #63352
  • Title and message resources should be enforced to exist to prevent printing empty messages #64151
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add executable bit to tizen sh files #64216
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Use Stream hash one-shot #64174
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Delete unused reference in System.Drawing.Primitives #64202
    area-System.Drawing
  • Respond to feedback in GenerateMultiTargetRoslynComponentTargetsFile #63943
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • [mono] Temporarily disable two tests that fail on arm64 LLVM FullAOT. #64180
    runtime-mono, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Implement IEquatable<T> on value types overriding Equals (and enable CA1066/CA1067) #63690
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add missing handle function enter/return macros #64061
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Ignoring leading dot when comparing cookie domains #64038
    area-System.Net
  • Reduce buffer size used in XmlReader when using Async mode #63459
    area-System.Xml, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Add blsr #63545
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Exclusively use GitHub teams for Libraries area mentions #64199
    area-Meta
  • Onboard new Triage & PR Boards #64198
    area-Meta
  • Remove spaces from GH labels used by FabricBot #64048
    area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • Update zip extraction to never throw any exceptions when the LastWriteTime update fails #63912
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Fix FileSystemAclExtensions.Create when passing a null FileSecurity #61297
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Fix one source of perf regression in GCHeap::Alloc. #64091
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Re-enable failing long path test #64113
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Port MD4 managed implementation from mono/mono #62074
    area-System.Security
  • Allow generating Dwarf version 5 #63988
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Fix several bugs in NullabilityInfoContext. #64143
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • More cleanups in assembly loader area #63157
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Check for CodeSizeZero error before any assumptions about code existing #63239
    area-ILVerification, community-contribution
  • JIT: simple forward substitution pass #63720
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure
  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Moved AssemblyName helpers to managed #62866
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Trying to fix issue #63788: "NetworkChange.NetworkAddressChanged event leaks threads on Linux #63963
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Faster IndexOf for substrings #63285
    area-System.Memory
  • [DRAFT] new wasm invoke icall with necessary changes from custom marshalers, but no marshalers #63998
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm
  • Reduce the size of HeaderDescriptor #64105
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Avoid name collision for covariant and hidden properties (#63443) #63823
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Updating the x64 casting behavior to be IEEE 754 compliant and to use saturation for overflow #61761
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Morph `Vector.Create(0)` to `Vector.Zero` #63821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix DNS cancellation deadlock #63904
    area-System.Net
  • [wasm] Initial templates implementation #63683
  • Restrict parallelism in LLVM FullAOT compile, to prevent OOM #63800
    area-Build-mono
  • Skip AOT of Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.dll for WASM, due to out-of-memory issues in CI #63958
  • Add CancellationToken to TextReader.ReadXAsync #61898
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Remove usage of FEATURE_CORESYSTEM #63850
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Make sure that shared memory object name meets the length requirements #64099
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Add Android Maui Startup testing #64121
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix ReadyToRun loading on Apple Silicon (.NET 6) #64104
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use lower call count threshold for tiering in debug builds #60945
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Support Single-file executable in Windows 7 #63533
    Servicing-approved, area-Single-File, community-contribution, 6.0.3
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-maui' #64056
    area-codeflow
  • Simplify alignment block marking #62940
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] document marshalling internals #63885
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Fixes of invalid biginteger casting #56710
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • [resubmit] BigInteger parsing optimization for large decimal string #55121
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • issue-22928 Add ImmutableArray Span-based APIs #61196
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Crossgen2 support for static virtual method resolution #54063
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add ref field runtime feature indication #64167
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 7.0.0
  • Repair inconsistent nullability nullability on TypeConverter (#63186) #63874
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Stop using `CLS_VAR` for "boxed statics" #63845
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [draft][wasm] InvokeJSFunctionByName #64062
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Skip Linq tests, which are not supported in interpreter only build (without FEATURE_COMPILE) #61914
    area-System.Linq.Expressions, needs-author-action
  • Allow StoreLclVar src to be IND/FLD. #59315
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Support chrome debugging using chrome://inspect #63900
    area-Debugger-mono
  • #51371 fixed failing test in iossimulator #63877
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • ARM64: Avoid jump stubs where possible #64148
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement support to Set Next Instruction Pointer. #64114
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Switch default modules to es6 #62740
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Unify reading from procfs to get network related information #63696
    area-System.Net
  • Improve String.Substring performance #62577
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Identify OSArchitecture at run-time #60910
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Refactor FileStatus.Unix. #62721
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT: ICustomMarshaller #62921
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • align GC memory load calculation on Linux with Docker and Kubernetes #64128
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • fix ping with SendIpHeader on FreeBSD #63531
    area-System.Net, os-freebsd
  • [mono] Optimize generic sharing for generic methods. #64129
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Throw during renegotiation if there is incomplete received TLS frame #64066
    area-System.Net.Security

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-24
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Question: ILScanner and Generics test #1783
  • Support for ARM32 in NativeAOT #833

PullRequests

Merged

  • Merge from dotnet/runtime #1831
    area-NativeAOT

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet cli doesn't seem to respect profile / launch file / command line arguments #23565
  • `%(TargetingPack.PackageDirectory)` blank when installed via .msi? #23562
  • dotnet tool init #23561

Closed

  • Add ability to list .NET Framework info with `dotnet` CLI #23560
  • dotnet --version fails if global.json specifies a newer SDK version #2334
    Discussion
  • Command `dotnet pack` with `--include-symbols` returns exit code 0 on failure #13432

PullRequests

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1565704 #23508
    Area-Infrastructure
  • rtm Branding for 6.0.2xx #23538
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Better caching for RazorSourceGenerator when SuppressRazorSourceGener… #23419
    Area-AspNetCore, 6.0.3xx
  • Remove 1.0.5 and 1.1.2 installs from our linux runtimes #23525
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #23532
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.x] Build Single-File for Windows 7 #23336
    Area-ILLink
  • Build Single-File for Windows 7 #23177
    Area-External, Area-SingleFile

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-24
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • switch expressions with modulo are reported as not exhaustive when, in fact, they are. #5677

Updated

  • Lightweight documentation comment syntax #2394
  • Champion: Simplified parameter null validation code #2145
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: nested members in `with` and object creation #4587
  • [Proposal]: Practical existential types for interfaces #5556

PullRequests

Merged

  • Track runtime feature flag #5676

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Raw string literal API review. #59046
    17.2
  • Investigate reducing raw-string lexing/parsing logic duplication. #59044
  • IDE does not offer name simplification for global using type aliases #59042
  • Extract Interface not available on double clicking class name #59038

Closed

  • Fixing "Please restart your debugging session" to make a developer's life easier. #27976
    Backlog
  • Code fixes shouldn't be offered for rude edits #26218
    Backlog
  • Debugging and edit-and-continue for pattern-matching: action items #25547
    Compiler.Next
  • EnC: defer active statement related work until after a document is edited #13276
    Backlog
  • CS8795 Showing When it Shouldn't #58913
  • Quick Actions refactoring offers to introduce parameter for variable that is already a parameter #58893
    17.2.P1
  • ClassifierHelper's AdjustSpans method occasionally generates an empty span #58658
    17.2
  • Warnversion Warning Waves.md is outdated #59013
  • Peek Definition fails on 'new' operator #58775
    Backlog
  • In code analyzer: add a suggestion to change expression body property to action method in controller classes #43112

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not hardcode position at which named arguments are starting for well-known attributes. #59048
    Area-Compilers
  • Clarify semi-required properties #59047
    Area-IDE
  • [Draft] import completion simplification #59045
    Area-IDE
  • Add additional test for raw interpolated strings. #59041
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove PROTOTYPE comment #59040
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix Roslyn Diagnostic Window and add Workspace panel #59035
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Remove special string node type #59008
    Area-Compilers
  • Associate module EnC diagnostics with changed documents #59036
    Next
  • Annotate CSharpSyntaxTree.Create path parameter as nullable #59005
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Update tests to catch the MEF v2 creation failure #58975
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Introduce Parameter Should Not Try to Introduce on a Parameter #58959
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Document recent warning waves #59014
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community, Next
  • Add raw string literals to compiler test plan #59039
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #59049
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Support `u8` type suffix for UTF8 string literals. #58991
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • SignatureHelp: guess best overload for incomplete invocations #31843
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Backlog
  • Json features #59034
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main #58934
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • API for getting a deterministic key for a Compilation #57134
    Area-Compilers
  • Json parsing #42864
    Area-IDE, Need Design Review
  • Json parsing with tests. #42873
    Area-IDE
  • Compiler warning CS8600 message: say possibly null-valued expression #58860
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix documentation bug on SyntaxFactory.VerbatimIdentifier #59004
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community
  • WRN_ConvertingNullableToNonNullable: fix literal #59016
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • 🧹 Services cleanup following previous review #49127
    Area-IDE
  • Fixed CodeLens misspellings in 'ru' localization #59021
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Address param-nullchecking public API design review #58987
    Area-Compilers
  • Filter cancellation exceptions in generator driver #58843
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.2
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1566533 #58926
    auto-merge
  • AsyncIterator: clear Current upon exit #58949
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Async Streams
  • [semi-auto-props]: Refactor and rename 'AccessingAutoPropertyFromConstructor' #58832
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Set OutputEncoding to UTF8 #59032
    Area-Compilers
  • Null annotate ISymbol.ContainingSymbol #58340
    Area-Compilers
  • Avoid duplicate syntax node callbacks for record declarations #58482
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • Verify correct additional location for reported diagnostic #58630
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • Don't show colon suffix in property pattern completion #59031
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix "Build Only" diagnostics content in error list #58409
    Area-IDE, 17.1
  • BackgroundAnalysisScope enhancements #57172
    Area-Analyzers, Needs UX Triage
  • Respect ReportSuppressedDiagnostics option for DiagnosticSuppressor #53045
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Can't get SignalR to work behind AWS ALB #39736
  • Automatic type inference won't work when an EventCallBack<T> is added #39734
  • Failed assert for m_disconnect_cts->reset() in connection_impl::start #39730
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [6.0.x] Port fix for https://github.com/dotnet/aspnetcore/issues/39526 to .NET 6 #39729
  • Publish test results for Blazor JS tests #39727
  • Blazor server Safari fullscreen issue #39726
  • Information in the JwtBearer comments is not up-to-date #39725
  • Support for a standard router in the new one or extension of the current one with additional parameters. #39719
    Discussions
  • With .NET 7.0 SDK, I cannot create .NET 6.0 web project, the target net6.0 can't be found. #39731

Closed

  • Can't use hotReloadProfile with additional arguments #39739
  • [Question] :Is MAUI.NET blazor shipped with a browser like electron? #39673
  • .Net6 Blazor SignalR Hub Connection causing high CPU in web browser #39482
  • gRPC H3 benchmarks broken #39549
  • EditContext.Validate() always true when using it without EditForm component #39717
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_actix #39593
  • SignalR TypeScript Client - The next event handler is not called if the previous event handler removes itself #39512
    7.0-preview2
  • Using CascadingValue causes to set out-dated value to child component #39699
  • Blazor Virtualize - Calls ItemsProvider with request.Count = 0 when not visible #39723
  • Create BlazorWebAssemblyApp 5.0/3.1 project in M1 machine and use the command "dotnet run", meet error:"Unhandled exception". #39397
  • Update Razor compiler to use global:: more liberally #18757
    7.0-preview2

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Don't reference test asset projects in Build.props #39733
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/5.0] Improve File access issues #39732
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • .ConfigureAwait(false) in SignalR client libraries #39728
    area-signalr

Merged

  • Use SHA256.HashData(Stream) one-shot #39738
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix obsolete method on EnableDataAnnotationsValidation #39737
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Update to SDK 7.0.100-alpha.1.22071.3 #39735
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Fixed typo in "systemd" #39714
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • !fixup! Use non-`-Svc` pool #39695
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix: The next event handler is not called if the previous event handler removes itself #39716
    area-signalr, community-contribution, 7.0-preview2
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4e9fe30` to `3d81736` #39720
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `a50a863` to `645b03f` #39721
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Spelling correction: Anuglar->Angular #39710
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • Refactor (WebJS) - Fix some ESLint warnings #39700
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Move some targets into a Directory.Build.targets file #39712
    area-runtime
  • Add support for DI in Hub methods #34047
    area-signalr
  • Added more stream result types #39709
    area-runtime
  • Removing from API Description parameters when inferred (FromPath) and not in the route #39607
    area-mvc
  • [Backport] Fix browser cookie tests to only run with HTTPS #39679
    area-signalr, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Support Custom Classes for ValidationMessage #38639
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Add dark mode for developer exception page #39676
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [Do not merge] ARM64 PR copy #39678
    area-runtime
  • Do not assume that `this._settings.loginMode` is not `undefined`. #35245
    area-blazor
  • Add format analyzer for `BindAsync` and `TryParse` custom bindings #37002
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Update code docs for DynamicRouteValueTransformer #36653
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Blazor Server - Auto reconnect on mobile browsers #32122
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Update Http1Connection.cs #39718
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [IOS] Can no longer debug #4297
  • Unable to build any maui apps #4294
  • [Perf] compile most-used type converters #4293
  • [Windows] Crash on SwipeView setting the SwipeMode #4292
  • [Android] Wrong SwipeView size #4291
  • [Windows] Templated IndicatorView not rendering #4290
  • RefreshView causes NullReferenceException with Shell template #4287
  • [iOS]Clip property is not working properly in preview 12 #4286
  • [Android]Clip property is not working properly in preview 12 #4285

Closed

  • MAUI XAML Editor Lightbulbs not working #3966
  • [Question] :How do I change Maui blazor's window's border color and its avatar/icons #4274
  • XamlC not using compiled type converters #4218
  • [Bug] Shell navigation bar color not rendering on iOS 15 #1654
    6.0.200-preview.11

PullRequests

Created

  • [Housekeeping] Add pending Core interface comments #4289
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Implement CanGoBack and CanGoForward properties in WebViewHandlers #4288
    partner/webview2, area/controls 🎮
  • Implement Eval method in WebViewHandlers #4284
    partner/webview2, area/controls 🎮
  • Shell page dependency injection now uses IServiceProvider.GetService() #4281

Merged

  • [build] fix $(PackageVersion) when building locally #4296
  • Add ExecutionPolicy and NoProfile to powershell command #4295
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #4130
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [X] restore compiled converters on Core types #4255

Updated

  • Make Essentials lifecycle registration happen by default #4221
  • Account for spacing when determining available space for star rows/columns #3871
    area/layout 🔲, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • Proposal - Replace internal use of MessagingCenter #3880
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Add CarouselView handlers on Controls [iOS] #3141
    6.0.200-preview.13
  • [ci] Target the Mac internal-macOS-11 hosted agent pool #4241
  • Support opening a new window in iOS Blazor WebView #4268
    area/blazor 🕸️, platform/iOS 🍎

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Migrations - InsertData silently truncates long strings that contain newlines due to improper `CONCAT` usage. #27271
  • `scaffold --data-annotations` no longer emits [Required] attributes. This causes issues running `ef dbcontext script` as required columns are emitted as NULLable #27270
  • Avoid automatic convert nested queries to joins #27267
  • PostgreSQL disallows using ungrouped columns from outer query in subquery #27266
  • Is using options injected by ConfigurationBuilder possible while migrating with EFCore tools? #27265
  • Nullable foreign key property deletes self entity from the database when set to null #27260
  • TemporalAsOf in temporal tables with non-temporal child entity throws InvalidOperationException when used with Include #27259
  • Nullability in TrackGraph signature #27257

Closed

  • Support for Azure AD RBAC when using Cosmos DB #27244
  • Allow non-nullable struct entity property to be DB optional, if conversion to/from nullable type defined. #27227
  • Aggregates on multiple child tables produces invalid SQL #27163
    6.0.x
  • After upgrading to EFCore 6 from EFCore 5 Included data are missing when using pagination (take/skip) #27193
  • AsSplitQuery does not keep consistent sort order with Included resources, Resulting in mismatch when a LIMIT is applied #27188
  • Null data in DB required data in UI/Service #27186
  • FK & Table naming convention mismatch between EFCore 2.1 & 5 .0 while adding migration #27184
  • EFCore - Triggers not getting scaffolded #27161
  • Auto Migration, Database Trigger, MultiColumn Primary Key DataAnnotations, AutoColumnOrdering #27160

PullRequests

Created

  • Add <inheritdoc /> in migrations #27268
  • Correct TrackGraph nullability #27261
    auto-merge
  • Remove quirks #27258

Merged

  • Run Helix SqlServer test on Ubuntu 1604 #27269
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #27230
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Updated

  • SQL parentheses work #27177
  • Fix typos in PropertyAccessMode #27248
  • [release/6.0] RevEng: Don't use nameof syntax (#26622) #27231
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x
